content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":261352,"originalJapaneseLine":"うるさい、そんな手段はとらねえよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shut up, I won't resort to such methods."},{"lineNumber":261353,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだな、それがいい、そんなブスでは人質の価値は無いぞとランス　がははは","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, that's good. With such an ugly girl, there's no value as a hostage, says Rance—hahaha."},{"lineNumber":261354,"originalJapaneseLine":"さて死ぬ覚悟はついたか","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, are you prepared to die?"},{"lineNumber":261355,"originalJapaneseLine":"くそっ、・・せめて正々堂々と一対一で勝負しろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn it... at least fight me one-on-one, fair and square."},{"lineNumber":261356,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":261357,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　ランスだけで戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"> Fight with Rance alone"},{"lineNumber":261358,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　みんなで戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"> Fight with everyone"},{"lineNumber":261359,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだな、俺一人でもお前は倒せる","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, even alone I can defeat you."},{"lineNumber":261360,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、俺には仲間がいるんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"But I have comrades."},{"lineNumber":261361,"originalJapaneseLine":"仲間と一緒に勝つ、これが主人公なのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Winning together with your comrades—that's what being the hero is about."},{"lineNumber":261362,"originalJapaneseLine":"いくぞ、みんなたこ殴りだー","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go, everyone! Beat them up together!"},{"lineNumber":261363,"originalJapaneseLine":"どこか主人公じゃー","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't that the hero somehow—"},{"lineNumber":261364,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを見ているメアリー、ひどい","translatedEnglishLine":"Mary, watching that, thinks it's awful."},{"lineNumber":261365,"originalJapaneseLine":"（だいぶ弱っているし、いけるな）","translatedEnglishLine":"(They're quite weakened, I can win.)"},{"lineNumber":261366,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、いいだろうと承諾するランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, Rance agrees."},{"lineNumber":261367,"originalJapaneseLine":"まわりの者、とくにカオスが止める、無茶だ、弱っていても魔人だぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Those around, especially Chaos, try to stop him—it's reckless, even weakened he's a demon lord."},{"lineNumber":261368,"originalJapaneseLine":"たまにはこういうサシも悪くないさ","translatedEnglishLine":"Sometimes, a one-on-one like this isn't so bad."},{"lineNumber":261369,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイは意外だった、まさか乗ってくるとは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei was surprised—never thought he would go along with it..."},{"lineNumber":261370,"originalJapaneseLine":"やるなお前、そうだな・・これでお前に倒されたら、それはそれでいいか","translatedEnglishLine":"Not bad. Yeah... if I get defeated by you like this, maybe that's fine."},{"lineNumber":261371,"originalJapaneseLine":"メアリーなんか一言","translatedEnglishLine":"Mary says something briefly."},{"lineNumber":261372,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘結果　勝利","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle result: Victory"},{"lineNumber":261373,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイが倒れる、今度は逃げる余力もなく瀕死","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei falls, now unable even to flee, near death."},{"lineNumber":261374,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピンチのレイをメアリー・アン(１０歳)が助ける","translatedEnglishLine":"Mary Ann (10 years old) rescues the troubled Rei."},{"lineNumber":261375,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスで止めをさされるという所で、メアリーが飛び出し身を盾にしてレイを守る。","translatedEnglishLine":"As Chaos is about to deliver the finishing blow, Mary jumps out and shields Rei with her body."},{"lineNumber":261376,"originalJapaneseLine":"どけと言ってもどかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Even when told to move aside, she won't budge."},{"lineNumber":261377,"originalJapaneseLine":"総統、女好きと聞く、わ・・私を抱くがよい、まだ未経験だぞ、　いやブスいらない","translatedEnglishLine":"Commander, I heard you like women. W-well, take me—I'm still inexperienced. No, never mind, I don't want an ugly one."},{"lineNumber":261378,"originalJapaneseLine":"すぐに美人になる、保証する、４年後私を抱く権利をやろう　いや、ブスのままだろからいらない","translatedEnglishLine":"She'll quickly become beautiful, I guarantee it. I'll give you the right to be with me in four years. No, you'll probably still be ugly, so forget it."},{"lineNumber":261379,"originalJapaneseLine":"ならどうしたら、こいつを助けてくれるんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then what should I do for you to help this one?"},{"lineNumber":261380,"originalJapaneseLine":"しらけた、もういいよ","translatedEnglishLine":"This is awkward. Enough already."},{"lineNumber":261381,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ、それは４年後私を抱く権利と引き替えにこの男の命を助けてやると","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh? So you mean you'll save this man's life in exchange for the right to be with me in four years?"},{"lineNumber":261382,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはいい、いらん、だが助けてやる","translatedEnglishLine":"That's fine. No thanks, but I'll save him anyway."},{"lineNumber":261383,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないのでレイは捕縛、","translatedEnglishLine":"With no other choice, Rei is captured."},{"lineNumber":261384,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":261385,"originalJapaneseLine":"牢屋で縛られたレイとメアリー","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei and Mary are tied up in the jail cell."},{"lineNumber":261386,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故助けた？","translatedEnglishLine":"Why did you save me?"},{"lineNumber":261387,"originalJapaneseLine":"お友達になってあげると言ったでしょ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Didn't I say I'll be your friend?"},{"lineNumber":261388,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺、お前を愛している","translatedEnglishLine":"I love you."},{"lineNumber":261389,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は総崩れになったが、それを追い詰めるほどの戦力は無いので","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army has been thoroughly broken, but there is no strength to pursue them further."},{"lineNumber":261390,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦況はトントン状態。","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle situation is at a standstill."},{"lineNumber":261391,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビョンホウはランスに怯えており、もう裏切る気配は無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Byonhou is afraid of Rance and shows no sign of betrayal anymore."},{"lineNumber":261392,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＤＸの会は、潰せる存在では無い。どこかに消えてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The DX Society is not something that can be crushed. They have disappeared somewhere."},{"lineNumber":261393,"originalJapaneseLine":"今回の事で各国政府との関係も切れていくだろうが、どうなるか分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"Relations with each country’s government will probably be severed because of this, but what will happen is unknown."},{"lineNumber":261394,"originalJapaneseLine":"少なくともランスは命狙われるわよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"At least, Rance’s life will be targeted,"},{"lineNumber":261395,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界の悪の元締めを敵にまわしたのだから","translatedEnglishLine":"since he has made an enemy of the world's main perpetrator of evil."},{"lineNumber":261396,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は総崩れになったが、それを追い詰めるほどの戦力は無いので","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army was completely routed, but there is insufficient force to press the advantage."},{"lineNumber":261397,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦況はトントン状態。","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle situation is at a stalemate."},{"lineNumber":261398,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビョンホウはランスに怯えており、もう裏切る気配は無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Byonhou is frightened of Rance and no longer shows signs of betrayal."},{"lineNumber":261399,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＤＸの会は、潰せる存在では無い。どこかに消えてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The DX Society is not an entity to be destroyed; it has vanished somewhere."},{"lineNumber":261400,"originalJapaneseLine":"今回の事で各国政府との関係も切れていくだろうが、どうなるか分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to this incident, relations with the governments of various countries may also be severed, but the outcome is uncertain."},{"lineNumber":261401,"originalJapaneseLine":"少なくともランスは命狙われるわよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"At least, Rance’s life will be targeted,"},{"lineNumber":261402,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界の悪の元締めを敵にまわしたのだから","translatedEnglishLine":"because he has made an enemy of the head of evil in this world."},{"lineNumber":261403,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍のど真ん中での戦い、正々堂々と戦いランスが勝つ","translatedEnglishLine":"A battle in the middle of the demon army, fighting fair and square, Rance wins."},{"lineNumber":261404,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどさっと倒れるレイ、マジかよ・・カイトを倒したというのは本当なのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei falls heavily, seriously... Is it true he defeated Kite?"},{"lineNumber":261405,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t周囲の魔物兵がレイ様ー、おのれ人間と攻めてこようとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"Surrounding demon soldiers cry out \"Lord Rei!\" and try to attack the humans,"},{"lineNumber":261406,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tレイが止める、かっこよく死なせてくれよと","translatedEnglishLine":"But Rei stops them, asking to let him die with dignity."},{"lineNumber":261407,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t傷付いたレイを会談の館内で倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"They defeat wounded Rei inside the conference hall."},{"lineNumber":261408,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t卑怯な・・と最初の奇襲で受けたカオスの傷が致命傷で倒れるレイ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cowardly...\" Rei falls, fatally wounded by Chaos’s initial surprise attack."},{"lineNumber":261409,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tがはははは、勝利すればいいのよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, it's fine as long as we win."},{"lineNumber":261410,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t止めを刺して魔血魂にしてしまいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll finish him off and turn him into a Demon Blood Soul."},{"lineNumber":261411,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカチューシャはいつの間にかいなくなっています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha has disappeared without anyone noticing."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うるさい、そんな手段はとらねえよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shut up, I won't resort to such methods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、それがいい、そんなブスでは人質の価値は無いぞとランス　がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, that's good. With such an ugly girl, there's no value as a hostage, says Rance—hahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて死ぬ覚悟はついたか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, are you prepared to die?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、・・せめて正々堂々と一対一で勝負しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it... at least fight me one-on-one, fair and square.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ランスだけで戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight with Rance alone

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　みんなで戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight with everyone

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、俺一人でもお前は倒せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, even alone I can defeat you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、俺には仲間がいるんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I have comrades.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間と一緒に勝つ、これが主人公なのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Winning together with your comrades—that's what being the hero is about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくぞ、みんなたこ殴りだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go, everyone! Beat them up together!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか主人公じゃー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't that the hero somehow—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見ているメアリー、ひどい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary, watching that, thinks it's awful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （だいぶ弱っているし、いけるな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (They're quite weakened, I can win.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いいだろうと承諾するランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, Rance agrees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まわりの者、とくにカオスが止める、無茶だ、弱っていても魔人だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those around, especially Chaos, try to stop him—it's reckless, even weakened he's a demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまにはこういうサシも悪くないさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes, a one-on-one like this isn't so bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイは意外だった、まさか乗ってくるとは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei was surprised—never thought he would go along with it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるなお前、そうだな・・これでお前に倒されたら、それはそれでいいか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not bad. Yeah... if I get defeated by you like this, maybe that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メアリーなんか一言
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary says something briefly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘結果　勝利
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle result: Victory

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイが倒れる、今度は逃げる余力もなく瀕死
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei falls, now unable even to flee, near death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピンチのレイをメアリー・アン(１０歳)が助ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary Ann (10 years old) rescues the troubled Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスで止めをさされるという所で、メアリーが飛び出し身を盾にしてレイを守る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Chaos is about to deliver the finishing blow, Mary jumps out and shields Rei with her body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どけと言ってもどかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even when told to move aside, she won't budge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統、女好きと聞く、わ・・私を抱くがよい、まだ未経験だぞ、　いやブスいらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander, I heard you like women. W-well, take me—I'm still inexperienced. No, never mind, I don't want an ugly one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに美人になる、保証する、４年後私を抱く権利をやろう　いや、ブスのままだろからいらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She'll quickly become beautiful, I guarantee it. I'll give you the right to be with me in four years. No, you'll probably still be ugly, so forget it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならどうしたら、こいつを助けてくれるんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then what should I do for you to help this one?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しらけた、もういいよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is awkward. Enough already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、それは４年後私を抱く権利と引き替えにこの男の命を助けてやると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh? So you mean you'll save this man's life in exchange for the right to be with me in four years?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはいい、いらん、だが助けてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's fine. No thanks, but I'll save him anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないのでレイは捕縛、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With no other choice, Rei is captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 牢屋で縛られたレイとメアリー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei and Mary are tied up in the jail cell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故助けた？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why did you save me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お友達になってあげると言ったでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn't I say I'll be your friend?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺、お前を愛している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I love you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は総崩れになったが、それを追い詰めるほどの戦力は無いので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has been thoroughly broken, but there is no strength to pursue them further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況はトントン状態。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation is at a standstill.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビョンホウはランスに怯えており、もう裏切る気配は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Byonhou is afraid of Rance and shows no sign of betrayal anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会は、潰せる存在では無い。どこかに消えてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The DX Society is not something that can be crushed. They have disappeared somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の事で各国政府との関係も切れていくだろうが、どうなるか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relations with each country’s government will probably be severed because of this, but what will happen is unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なくともランスは命狙われるわよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least, Rance’s life will be targeted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の悪の元締めを敵にまわしたのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: since he has made an enemy of the world's main perpetrator of evil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は総崩れになったが、それを追い詰めるほどの戦力は無いので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was completely routed, but there is insufficient force to press the advantage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況はトントン状態。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation is at a stalemate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビョンホウはランスに怯えており、もう裏切る気配は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Byonhou is frightened of Rance and no longer shows signs of betrayal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会は、潰せる存在では無い。どこかに消えてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The DX Society is not an entity to be destroyed; it has vanished somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の事で各国政府との関係も切れていくだろうが、どうなるか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to this incident, relations with the governments of various countries may also be severed, but the outcome is uncertain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なくともランスは命狙われるわよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least, Rance’s life will be targeted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の悪の元締めを敵にまわしたのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because he has made an enemy of the head of evil in this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍のど真ん中での戦い、正々堂々と戦いランスが勝つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle in the middle of the demon army, fighting fair and square, Rance wins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どさっと倒れるレイ、マジかよ・・カイトを倒したというのは本当なのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei falls heavily, seriously... Is it true he defeated Kite?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の魔物兵がレイ様ー、おのれ人間と攻めてこようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surrounding demon soldiers cry out "Lord Rei!" and try to attack the humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイが止める、かっこよく死なせてくれよと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rei stops them, asking to let him die with dignity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傷付いたレイを会談の館内で倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They defeat wounded Rei inside the conference hall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卑怯な・・と最初の奇襲で受けたカオスの傷が致命傷で倒れるレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cowardly..." Rei falls, fatally wounded by Chaos’s initial surprise attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、勝利すればいいのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, it's fine as long as we win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 止めを刺して魔血魂にしてしまいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll finish him off and turn him into a Demon Blood Soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャはいつの間にかいなくなっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha has disappeared without anyone noticing.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

So you mean you'll save this man's life in exchange for the right to be with me in four years?"},{"lineNumber":261382,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはいい、いらん、だが助けてやる","translatedEnglishLine":"That's fine. No thanks, but I'll save him anyway."},{"lineNumber":261383,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないのでレイは捕縛、","translatedEnglishLine":"With no other choice, Rei is captured."},{"lineNumber":261384,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":261385,"originalJapaneseLine":"牢屋で縛られたレイとメアリー","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei and Mary are tied up in the jail cell."},{"lineNumber":261386,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故助けた？","translatedEnglishLine":"Why did you save me?"},{"lineNumber":261387,"originalJapaneseLine":"お友達になってあげると言ったでしょ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Didn't I say I'll be your friend?"},{"lineNumber":261388,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺、お前を愛している","translatedEnglishLine":"I love you."},{"lineNumber":261389,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は総崩れになったが、それを追い詰めるほどの戦力は無いので","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army has been thoroughly broken, but there is no strength to pursue them further."},{"lineNumber":261390,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦況はトントン状態。","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle situation is at a standstill."},{"lineNumber":261391,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビョンホウはランスに怯えており、もう裏切る気配は無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Byonhou is afraid of Rance and shows no sign of betrayal anymore."},{"lineNumber":261392,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＤＸの会は、潰せる存在では無い。どこかに消えてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The DX Society is not something that can be crushed. Is it true he defeated Kite?"},{"lineNumber":261405,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t周囲の魔物兵がレイ様ー、おのれ人間と攻めてこようとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"Surrounding demon soldiers cry out \"Lord Rei!\" and try to attack the humans,"},{"lineNumber":261406,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tレイが止める、かっこよく死なせてくれよと","translatedEnglishLine":"But Rei stops them, asking to let him die with dignity."},{"lineNumber":261407,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t傷付いたレイを会談の館内で倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"They defeat wounded Rei inside the conference hall."},{"lineNumber":261408,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t卑怯な・・と最初の奇襲で受けたカオスの傷が致命傷で倒れるレイ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cowardly...\" Rei falls, fatally wounded by Chaos’s initial surprise attack."},{"lineNumber":261409,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tがはははは、勝利すればいいのよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, it's fine as long as we win."},{"lineNumber":261410,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t止めを刺して魔血魂にしてしまいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll finish him off and turn him into a Demon Blood Soul."},{"lineNumber":261411,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカチューシャはいつの間にかいなくなっています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha has disappeared without anyone noticing."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うるさい、そんな手段はとらねえよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shut up, I won't resort to such methods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、それがいい、そんなブスでは人質の価値は無いぞとランス　がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, that's good. With such an ugly girl, there's no value as a hostage, says Rance—hahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて死ぬ覚悟はついたか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, are you prepared to die?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、・・せめて正々堂々と一対一で勝負しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it... at least fight me one-on-one, fair and square.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ランスだけで戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight with Rance alone

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　みんなで戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight with everyone

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、俺一人でもお前は倒せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, even alone I can defeat you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、俺には仲間がいるんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I have comrades.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間と一緒に勝つ、これが主人公なのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Winning together with your comrades—that's what being the hero is about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくぞ、みんなたこ殴りだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go, everyone! Beat them up together!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか主人公じゃー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't that the hero somehow—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見ているメアリー、ひどい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary, watching that, thinks it's awful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （だいぶ弱っているし、いけるな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (They're quite weakened, I can win.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いいだろうと承諾するランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, Rance agrees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まわりの者、とくにカオスが止める、無茶だ、弱っていても魔人だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those around, especially Chaos, try to stop him—it's reckless, even weakened he's a demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまにはこういうサシも悪くないさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes, a one-on-one like this isn't so bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイは意外だった、まさか乗ってくるとは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei was surprised—never thought he would go along with it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるなお前、そうだな・・これでお前に倒されたら、それはそれでいいか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not bad. Yeah... if I get defeated by you like this, maybe that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メアリーなんか一言
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary says something briefly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘結果　勝利
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle result: Victory

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイが倒れる、今度は逃げる余力もなく瀕死
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei falls, now unable even to flee, near death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピンチのレイをメアリー・アン(１０歳)が助ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary Ann (10 years old) rescues the troubled Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスで止めをさされるという所で、メアリーが飛び出し身を盾にしてレイを守る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Chaos is about to deliver the finishing blow, Mary jumps out and shields Rei with her body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どけと言ってもどかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even when told to move aside, she won't budge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統、女好きと聞く、わ・・私を抱くがよい、まだ未経験だぞ、　いやブスいらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander, I heard you like women. W-well, take me—I'm still inexperienced. No, never mind, I don't want an ugly one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに美人になる、保証する、４年後私を抱く権利をやろう　いや、ブスのままだろからいらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She'll quickly become beautiful, I guarantee it. I'll give you the right to be with me in four years. No, you'll probably still be ugly, so forget it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならどうしたら、こいつを助けてくれるんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then what should I do for you to help this one?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しらけた、もういいよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is awkward. Enough already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、それは４年後私を抱く権利と引き替えにこの男の命を助けてやると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh? So you mean you'll save this man's life in exchange for the right to be with me in four years?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはいい、いらん、だが助けてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's fine. No thanks, but I'll save him anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないのでレイは捕縛、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With no other choice, Rei is captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 牢屋で縛られたレイとメアリー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei and Mary are tied up in the jail cell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故助けた？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why did you save me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お友達になってあげると言ったでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn't I say I'll be your friend?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺、お前を愛している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I love you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は総崩れになったが、それを追い詰めるほどの戦力は無いので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has been thoroughly broken, but there is no strength to pursue them further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況はトントン状態。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation is at a standstill.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビョンホウはランスに怯えており、もう裏切る気配は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Byonhou is afraid of Rance and shows no sign of betrayal anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会は、潰せる存在では無い。どこかに消えてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The DX Society is not something that can be crushed. They have disappeared somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の事で各国政府との関係も切れていくだろうが、どうなるか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relations with each country’s government will probably be severed because of this, but what will happen is unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なくともランスは命狙われるわよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least, Rance’s life will be targeted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の悪の元締めを敵にまわしたのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: since he has made an enemy of the world's main perpetrator of evil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は総崩れになったが、それを追い詰めるほどの戦力は無いので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was completely routed, but there is insufficient force to press the advantage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況はトントン状態。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation is at a stalemate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビョンホウはランスに怯えており、もう裏切る気配は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Byonhou is frightened of Rance and no longer shows signs of betrayal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会は、潰せる存在では無い。どこかに消えてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The DX Society is not an entity to be destroyed; it has vanished somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の事で各国政府との関係も切れていくだろうが、どうなるか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to this incident, relations with the governments of various countries may also be severed, but the outcome is uncertain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なくともランスは命狙われるわよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least, Rance’s life will be targeted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の悪の元締めを敵にまわしたのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because he has made an enemy of the head of evil in this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍のど真ん中での戦い、正々堂々と戦いランスが勝つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle in the middle of the demon army, fighting fair and square, Rance wins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どさっと倒れるレイ、マジかよ・・カイトを倒したというのは本当なのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei falls heavily, seriously... Is it true he defeated Kite?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の魔物兵がレイ様ー、おのれ人間と攻めてこようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surrounding demon soldiers cry out "Lord Rei!" and try to attack the humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイが止める、かっこよく死なせてくれよと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rei stops them, asking to let him die with dignity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傷付いたレイを会談の館内で倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They defeat wounded Rei inside the conference hall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卑怯な・・と最初の奇襲で受けたカオスの傷が致命傷で倒れるレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cowardly..." Rei falls, fatally wounded by Chaos’s initial surprise attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、勝利すればいいのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, it's fine as long as we win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 止めを刺して魔血魂にしてしまいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll finish him off and turn him into a Demon Blood Soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャはいつの間にかいなくなっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha has disappeared without anyone noticing.
